alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; South End San Joaquin Valley; South End of the Lower Sierra; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 8:17PM PST until January 28 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...South End San Joaquin Valley, Kern County Portion of the Lower Sierra, Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; South End San Joaquin Valley; South End of the Lower Sierra; Tehachapi
